listener
Class ListenerImpl.ListenerThread

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      listener.ListenerImpl.ListenerThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Enclosing class:
ListenerImpl
public class ListenerImpl.ListenerThread
extends java.lang.Thread

This class is a thread for processing file events for watched directories. This needs to be a thread because waiting for file events is a blocking operation.

Author:
Or Shwartz
